pattern_matching.name: Pattern matching
pattern_matching.comment: Kotlin's `when` expression supports advanced pattern matching like type checks and range checks.
pattern_matching.code:
when (obj) {
    1 -> "One"
    "Hello" -> "Greeting"
    is Long -> "Long"
    !is String -> "Not a string"
    else -> "Unknown"
}
